CustomFieldTranslation.name: Campaign_Member_Non_Responded_Status__c
CustomFieldTranslation.help: The default status you want NPSP to use on Campaign Members for Open or Closed/Lost Opportunities that have a Primary Contact and a Primary Campaign Source associated with them. If you leave this blank, NPSP uses the first non-Responded status.
CustomFieldTranslation.label: Campaign Member Non Responded Status
